title: Need help with league client window
body:
http://imgur.com/jfHhcvH
Ok so this is my screen. My keyboard was not responding so I spammed Alt+Tab in a hurry (just got into game) until it worked and it ended up screwing with the boarder whatever. I un-installed and re-installed. It's obviously not major but it's annoying. Any idea on how to fix? PLZ AND TY

replies.body: either you weren't fullscreen, or you pressed F9
Must've, but yeah it went to windowed mode somehow lol. Cheers bud
VampirismFire is right, looks like you went into some weird windowed mode.
Go into settings and make it full screened or borderless.
